Articles.Content:
Hey i'm here to ask someone to do some BDA Fight vs me i want to test my skills with someone and not AI guard mode plane easy to lock here is my gmail to contact me (must contact me with it) leave your name and when you can do it

[email protected]

You know, that's kind of impossible seeing as DMP (The current, and only Multiplayer mod) doesn't support BDArmoury. Heh, you may have to settle with the AI. It's hard IMO to kill, 

so it should be plenty.

 

Sorry, 

   -SPAddict
Well if you can tell me how to make them do other things then go round and round or strsitgh foward i'll be able to do a real fight
set yourself to Team A, and maybe set the AI to team B. ? Maybe.....
